title: Maple font and possible similar typeface
content:
I am trying to find a grotesque sans serif that could be very similar to [Maple](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110211/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/process/maple_regular/). I have looked at [all of these grotesque sans serifs](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110211/http:/typophile.com/node/18671) but it seems that none of them are close. Are there other typefaces which are based on Stephenson Blake that are very similar to Maple?

 [‹ ID possible ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110211/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47003 "Go to previous forum topic") [The font from "The Kingdom" movie title sequence ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110211/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46980 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Capnhud

comments.content:
What is it about Maple that you like but prevents you from using it?

Anyway, here are a couple of other options:

Bulldog  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative\_alliance/bulldog\_vp/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110211/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/bulldog_vp/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative\_alliance/bulldog\_vp/")

Parry Grotesque  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/ourtype/parry\_grotesque\_4/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110211/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/ourtype/parry_grotesque_4/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/ourtype/parry\_grotesque\_4/")

Dyna Grotesk  
 [http://www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/families-55-dynagrotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110211/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/families-55-dynagrotesk "http://www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/families-55-dynagrotesk")

Nothing prevents me from using it but I figured if I could find a similar typeface and see what typeface was used with it I would have a good idea of what to pair with Maple.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here

It would appear that the closest to it would be the font used by sheffield university, but there does not appear to be a font called [“Blake”](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110211/http:/www.shef.ac.uk/marcoms/visualid/elements/fonts.html)that was done by [HouseStyle Graphics.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110211/http:/www.housestylegraphics.com/)

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here

Yes this is close, but the g is what is throwing it off.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
